comment: / A note on the Dingell situation . John Dingell was politically nothing like me , or I him . We probably didn't share a single policy issue . We used to occasionally scrap on Twitter in good fun .
amr:
# ::snt / A note on the Dingell situation . John Dingell was politically nothing like me , or I him . We probably didn't share a single policy issue . We used to occasionally scrap on Twitter in good fun .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (n / note-01
            :topic (s / situation
                  :mod (p / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "John"
                              :op2 "Dingell"))))
      :snt2 (r / resemble-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "John"
                        :op2 "Dingell"))
            :ARG2 (o / or
                  :op1 (ii / i)
                  :op2 (h / he))
            :ARG3 (p3 / politics))
      :snt3 (p4 / probable
            :domain (s2 / share-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (ii2 / issue-02
                        :ARG0 (p5 / policy-01)
                        :ARG1-of (s3 / single-02))))
      :snt4 (s4 / scrap-01
            :ARG0 w
            :medium (p6 / publication
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "Twitter"))
            :frequency (o2 / occasional)
            :purpose (f / fun-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1-of (g / good-02))
            :time (u / use-03)))

comment: Don't miss the assumed quid pro quo . He " gave " to the Dingles and expected loyalty in return . Nevermind that what he " gave " had been earned .
amr:
# ::snt Don't miss the assumed quid pro quo . He " gave " to the Dingles and expected loyalty in return . Nevermind that what he " gave " had been earned .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (m2 / miss-02
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (q / quid-pro
                  :ARG1-of (a / assume-01)))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (g / give-01

                  :ARG2 (f / family
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Dingles")))
            :op2 (e / expect-01

                  :ARG1 (l / loyal-01

                        :ARG2 f)
                  :ARG3-of (r / return-05)))
      :snt3 (m3 / mind-15

            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (e2 / earn-01
                  :ARG1 (t2 / thing

            :time (e3 / ever)))
